page.title: 13NEWS - MAY 16 1985 ERDINGTON
page.content: Kids Club: Children between the ages of 5 and 10 have a good opportunity to occupy their time in different ways, because Sutton's YMCA have started a new Youth Club which involves several different activities. The club will open between 6 and 7.30 p.m. in the YMCA building in Sutton High Street on Tuesday evenings. The different activities include sport, drama, discos, swimming and snooker. Tools taken: Carpentry tools worth Â£1000 were taken from a van parked outside the Wychbold Hotel in Birmingham Road Sutton. Watch it: Burglars raided a house in Streetly Lane Sutton. They got away with a VHS video, Â£47 and a gold bracelet. Shop raid: Thieves broke into Furnishings Italia in Sutton Parade and stole a coffee table worth Â£300 and a table lamp costing Â£116.
